description.raw:
This adds ```analysis_filter``` callbacks to the Plugins API. 

A ```analysis_filter``` is passed a filepath of the h5file that is about to be send to analysis. If the ```analysis_filter``` returns True this shot will not be sent to analysis any other or no return value will not have any effect.

The reasoning for this new callback is that in our lab we want to rerun the first shot of each sequence before sending it to analysis. This needs to be done because we use the end of the last experiment to prepare the MOT for the next one to make use of the dead time in between shots. MOT parameters might vary between different sequences and pauses between sequences make the first shot have a much bigger MOT so the first shot need to be run twice.
